seo: Spring Data Rest,远程命令执行,CVE-2017-8046,漏洞检测
seo_en: Spring Data Rest,Remote Command Execution,CVE-2017-8046,Vulnerability Detection
summary: 该插件用于检测Spring Data Rest应用是否存在CVE-2017-8046远程命令执行漏洞，通过发送特定的HTTP请求来验证目标系统是否受影响。
summary_en: This plugin is used to detect whether the Spring Data Rest application has CVE-2017-8046 Remote Command Execution vulnerability by sending specific HTTP requests to verify if the target system is affected.
